response.headline: Shikisai no Oka flower fields in Hokkaido, Japan featuring colorful striped hillside blooms
response.summary: Shikisai no Oka in Hokkaido offers spectacular rainbow-striped flower fields with yellow, orange, red, and purple blooms arranged in geometric patterns across rolling hills. The Wandering Lens promotes this as part of Hokkaido's must-visit spots that can be covered in one trip.

extracted_text: All of Hokkaido's must-visit spots are here—One Trip Covers It All!
objects: Colorful flower fields in geometric stripes
image_details.key_interest: Geometric rainbow-striped flower fields creating a natural spectacle
